title: Ep 123: Outfit Formulas with Geezer Alley Peplinski
itunes:title: Ep 123: Outfit Formulas with Geezer Alley Peplinski
itunes:subtitle: Never look at your closet with a blank stare again.
description:
Longtime listener and community member Alley Peplinski joins us to talk about her favorite towels, outfit formulas (it’s a subscription!), and her American Girl Doll of choice. And remember, at the end of all of this? Mitsubishi says we’ll be together again.

 


Dock and Bay Towels: https://us.dockandbay.com/ 

Outfit Formulas: https://outfitformulas.com/ 

 


Gee Thanks! appreciates its supporters, especially today’s guest Alley Peplinski, Becca Sheaffer, Allie Nagy, Angi James and Erin Gibson! 


Shop our Amazon Storefront: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit 


Want to support? Join the Patreon! Sign up: https://www.patreon.com/geethanksandfriends** 


Join the Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
